trends: There has been one other sighting in Clifton
There were no other sightings in Clifton on or around May 15th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsDuring the afternoon of May the 15th 2010 a few friends of mine took some pictures of this strange formation in the clouds. They said that this long cylinder formation did not seem to be moving and after about 5 minuets or so slowly dissipated. From their description of the event it did not sound as if it was some kind of craft but I found the pictures so interesting that I wanted to find out if this is a naturally occurring event. So far I have not been able to find anything like it. Take a look at the pic and see for yourself.
